full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYABS 'GRO'I KHRID KYIG THUB BSTAN SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,CES SKYABS 'GRO'I KHRID YIG THUB BSTAN SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLO BU BU LUNG RIGS SMRA BA AU TZU MU CHEN DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL GYIS YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA PAndI TA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO'I SDE YAB BSRAS RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL PA, PAN CHUNG RIGS SMRA BA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DGE LDAN BSTAN @016B PA 'PHEL RGYAS GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG 'JIGS MED GRAGS PAS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN BSTAN PA'I SGOR 'JIG PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS,, ,,AOm SVASTI, ,THUB BSTAN 'DZIN MAR SKAL BZANG ZHING PA'I TSOGS, ,PHAN BDE'I LO TOG LONGS SU SPYOD PA'I PHYIR, ,BKRA SHIS GA-YAS SU 'KHYIL BA'I CHOS GRVA LAS, ,CHOS SBYIN BDUD RTZI'I GRU CHAR 'DI PHAB PO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
